languages.text: "Ваши слова источают ядовито-зеленые цвета, Вольный Торговец. Они душат окружающих, что поводок на шее. Но коль вы желаете заводить не союзников, а пленных — мне ничего не остается, кроме как стать одной из них".

traits.locale_text: "Ваши слова источают ядовито-зеленые цвета, Вольный Торговец. Они душат окружающих, что поводок на шее. Но коль вы желаете заводить не друзей, а пленных — мне ничего не остается, кроме как стать одной из них".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Your words are oozing with virid green, Rogue Trader. They are choking people like a leash wrapped around their necks. But if you wish to make prisoners instead of allies, I have no choice but to become one of them."
languages.original_text: "Ваши слова источают ядовито-зеленые цвета, Вольный Торговец. Они душат окружающих, что поводок на шее. Но коль вы желаете заводить не союзников, а пленных — мне ничего не остается, кроме как стать одной из них".

traits.locale_text: "Your words are oozing with virid green, Rogue Trader. They are choking people like a leash wrapped around their necks. But if you wish to make prisoners instead of allies, I am have no choice but to become one of them."

traits.locale_text: "Your words are oozing with virid green, Rogue Trader. They are choking people like a leash wrapped around their necks. But if you wish to make prisoners instead of allies, I have no choice but to become one of them."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你的话语充满了青翠的绿色，行商浪人。这些话就像缠在脖子上的绳索一样令人窒息。不过，如果你想要的是囚犯而不是盟友，那我别无选择，只能成为囚犯中的一员。”
languages.original_text: "Your words are oozing with virid green, Rogue Trader. They are choking people like a leash wrapped around their necks. But if you wish to make prisoners instead of allies, I have no choice but to become one of them."

traits.locale_text: “你的话语充满了青翠的绿色，行商浪人。这些话就像缠在脖子上的绳索一样令人窒息。不过，如果你想要的是囚犯而不是盟友，那我别无选择，只能成为囚犯中的一员。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Sus palabras rezuman un verde frondoso, Comerciante Independiente. Ahogan a la gente como una correa al cuello. Pero si busca prisioneros en vez de aliados, tendré que ser una más».
languages.original_text: "Your words are oozing with virid green, Rogue Trader. They are choking people like a leash wrapped around their necks. But if you wish to make prisoners instead of allies, I have no choice but to become one of them."

traits.locale_text: «Sus palabras rezuman un verde frondoso, Comerciante Independiente. Ahogan a la gente como una correa al cuello. Pero si busca prisioneros en vez de aliados, tendré que ser una más».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者様、お言葉に新緑がにじんでおります。それらは首に巻きついた鎖のように、人々の首を絞めているのです。ですが、もし{name}様が味方の代わりに囚人を作りたいのなら、あたくしもその一員となるよりほかありません」
languages.original_text: "Your words are oozing with virid green, Rogue Trader. They are choking people like a leash wrapped around their necks. But if you wish to make prisoners instead of allies, I have no choice but to become one of them."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者様、お言葉に新緑がにじんでおります。それらは首に巻きついた鎖のように、人々の首を絞めているのです。ですが、もし{name}様が味方の代わりに囚人を作りたいのなら、あたくしもその一員となるよりほかありません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Worte sind üppig grün, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Sie würgen Menschen wie eine Leine um den Hals. Aber wenn Euch Gefangene lieber sind als Verbündete, bleibt mir keine Wahl, als eine der Ersteren zu werden."
languages.original_text: "Your words are oozing with virid green, Rogue Trader. They are choking people like a leash wrapped around their necks. But if you wish to make prisoners instead of allies, I have no choice but to become one of them."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Worte sind üppig grün, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Sie würgen Menschen wie eine Leine um den Hals. Aber wenn Euch Gefangene lieber sind als Verbündete, bleibt mir keine Wahl, als eine der Ersteren zu werden."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vos paroles suintent d'un vert vif, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Elles étouffent comme une laisse attachée autour d'un cou. Mais si vous souhaitez traiter vos alliés en prisonniers, alors je n'ai d'autre choix que de m'incliner. »
languages.original_text: "Your words are oozing with virid green, Rogue Trader. They are choking people like a leash wrapped around their necks. But if you wish to make prisoners instead of allies, I have no choice but to become one of them."

traits.locale_text: « Vos paroles suintent d'un vert vif, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Elles étouffent comme une laisse attachée autour d'un cou. Mais si vous souhaitez traiter vos alliés en prisonniers, alors je n'ai d'autre choix que de m'incliner. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Sözcüklerinden parlak bir yeşil rengi fışkırıyor Hür Tacir. İnsanı boyna dolanmış bir kırbaç gibi boğuyorlar. Ancak bir müttefik yerine bir esire sahip olmayı yeğliyorsan öyle olmaktan başka seçeneğim yok."
languages.original_text: "Your words are oozing with virid green, Rogue Trader. They are choking people like a leash wrapped around their necks. But if you wish to make prisoners instead of allies, I have no choice but to become one of them."

traits.locale_text: "Sözcüklerinden parlak bir yeşil rengi fışkırıyor Hür Tacir. İnsanları boyunlarına dolanmış bir kırbaç gibi boğuyor ama bir müttefik yerine bir esire sahip olmayı yeğliyorsan, öyle olmaktan başka seçeneğim yok."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
